result.arabic_text: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
result.translation: 76. Kaadu A- Nabiyow cusey! Nabii Nuuc, Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii luutuk naharat isi Rabbih seeceeh, isi mara abaare waqdi, tokkel keenit abe abaaró Yalli kaak oggolleeh, kaa kee kaal yeemene mara kaxxa gibdaabinay (maggo leet aben xuumiyya kinnuk) kaa cine mari edde finqitek naggosneh iyye Yalli.
